issue.title: Is the new simulator working for anyone?

content.raw:
Hi Alfredo,

I am able to launch a robot and control it with the joystick \(although it’s quite slow\).  However, none of the laser scan data is showing up.  The IGN output claims its publishing it:

\[Msg\] Publishing laser scans on \[/model/X2/front\_scan\]

But rostopic doesn’t show it:

developer@docker:~/subt\_ws/src/subt/subt\_ign/launch$ rostopic list  
/X1/cmd\_vel  
/X1/comm  
/X1/light  
/X1/select  
/X2/cmd\_vel  
/X2/comm  
/X2/command/motor\_speed  
/X2/front/image\_raw  
/X2/imu/data  
/X2/light  
/X2/pose  
/X2/select  
/X3/cmd\_vel  
/X3/comm  
/X3/light  
/X3/select  
/X4/cmd\_vel  
/X4/comm  
/X4/light  
/X4/select  
/clock  
/diagnostics  
/joy  
/rosout  
/rosout\_agg  
/subt/score  
/tf  
/tf\_static

Is that expected to be working at this point?  If not, do you have any idea when it might be available?

Thanks!  
-Adam
content.html:
Hi Alfredo,

I am able to launch a robot and control it with the joystick (although it’s quite slow). However, none of the laser scan data is showing up. The IGN output claims its publishing it:

[Msg] Publishing laser scans on [/model/X2/front_scan]

But rostopic doesn’t show it:

developer@docker:~/subt_ws/src/subt/subt_ign/launch$ rostopic list
/X1/cmd_vel
/X1/comm
/X1/light
/X1/select
/X2/cmd_vel
/X2/comm
/X2/command/motor_speed
/X2/front/image_raw
/X2/imu/data
/X2/light
/X2/pose
/X2/select
/X3/cmd_vel
/X3/comm
/X3/light
/X3/select
/X4/cmd_vel
/X4/comm
/X4/light
/X4/select
/clock
/diagnostics
/joy
/rosout
/rosout_agg
/subt/score
/tf
/tf_static

Is that expected to be working at this point? If not, do you have any idea when it might be available?

Thanks!
-Adam
